nodes.bodyText: Believe we have to deprecate this method first as it is in a public package. Should be able to just return false always I assume.
Or maybe this method is obscure enough that we don't need to worry.

hmmm.. I assumed this class was internal. I don't see any use case for a user to use any of this methods :/
If you want, I can add it back.
It is in a package that is public. We should probably just put it back in and always return false and deprecate for now.
